sources.title: Tiger Bay (1959 +++++ Classic Crime Drama) Hayley Mills, 1960 BAFTA Winning Film Retrospective
sources.description: Thriller: Plot: A twelve-year-old tomboy witnesses the murder of a woman by her Polish merchant marine boyfriend, but bonds with him and thwarts the police in their investigation. **The non-profit streaming of the commercial free, quality films I have uploaded to archive.org, are for educational purposes . I have uploaded each movie for posterity, with the hope that all present and future generations will learn from and enjoy them , as much as I have. I own zero rights to this film nor any other I have uploaded, and have no wish to infringe on existing copyright laws. DEF gp ddh**
